name: ExciteTrike
description:
All the fun and of Excitebike, but this time, there's a third wheel.

Known Issues

  • Occasionally the Rider may pass through obstacles, especially when approaching them from off the track
  • No sound (yet!)
  • No in-game settings menu (yet!)

Performance Note: The game uses some post-processing effects, which are turned off when played on the "Low" setting, for an extra performance boost.
